venue.address_2: (Teele Square; just steps from Davis Square)
venue.name: PJ Ryans

item.description:
Let's get together to celebrate the end of the work week and the beginning of June with cocktails and conversations at our favorite local watering hole, PJ Ryan's.Â  The place has a solid beer selection and good appetizers as well as a full pub menu.

We will also be giving a send-off to one of our departing colleagues, Erin from Chemical & Biological Engineering.

So join us for beers and tears.
item.name: Jumbo Happy Hour
